General.Name: Phenom Resources Corp
General.Description: Phenom Resources Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Canada and the United States. The company holds an option to earn a 100% interest in the Carlin gold-vanadium project and Section 22 property located in Elko County, Nevada. It also owns interests in the West Jerome copper property located in Arizona. The company was formerly known as First Vanadium Corp. and changed its name to Phenom Resources Corp. in July 2021. Phenom Resources Corp. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
